Articles.Content:
Have you ever thought "Man, that's a good idea for a planet, but I just don't have the PQSMod for it..."? Then look no further!

This is the thread for planet makers to share their ideas on new PQSMods, some of which actually may become a reality!

Well, it would be really helpful 4 some test planets to make some canyons, moholes or caves.

And I'm curious, how do you make a PQSMod?
